body:
Please refer to @WillAyd's explanation, https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/21488#issuecomment-397500951

```
In [1]: data = [" this is github and i am posting an issue here
   ...: about pandas so i want the solution"]

In [2]: s = pd.Series(data)

In [3]: s
Out[3]:
0     this is github and i am posting an issue here...
dtype: object

In [4]: s.iloc[0]
Out[4]: ' this is github and i am posting an issue here about pandas so i want the solution'

In [5]: s.to_excel('test.xlsx')

In [6]: s1 = pd.read_excel('test.xlsx')

In [7]: s1
Out[7]:
                                                   0
0   this is github and i am posting an issue here...

In [8]: s1.iloc[0, 0]
Out[8]: u' this is github and i am posting an issue here about pandas so i want the solution'
```
